toggleValue: The value to set when toggling word wrap on. This value will be directly applied to `editor.wordWrap`.
toggleValue.on: Lines will wrap at viewport width.
toggleValue.bounded: Lines will wrap at the minimum of viewport and `editor.wordWrapColumn`.
configurationTarget: Target for updating the word wrap setting.
configurationTarget.auto: Updates the scope where the current setting is being read from. **(Recommended)**
configurationTarget.workspace: Updates the workspace setting. Use this to create workspace-specific configuration. Falls back to global setting if no workspace is open.
limitToLanguageScope: When toggled while editing a text document, writes to language-specific settings.
